original_title: PERSONA SUPER LIVE P-SOUND BOMB!!!! 2017~港の犯行を目撃せよ!~
overview: Persona Super Live P-Sound Bomb!!!! 2017: Witness the Harbor’s Crime” was held at Yokohama Arena on August 2, 2017. It was the first large scale Persona Concert since “Persona Super Live 2015: Night of the Phantom.”
title: Persona Super Live P-Sound Bomb!!!! 2017: Witness the Harbor's Crime
